ing.item: (10-oz) frozen chopped spinach; cooked and drained

directions.step:
Quarter drained artichoke hearts and spread over bottom of an 8x8 casserole. Spoon spinach over artichokes. Melt butter and cream cheese in a small saucepan. (Cream cheese will be lumpy.) Pour and spread over spinach. Sprinkle crumbled bacon over cream cheese mixture. Sprinkle well with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350Ã¸ for 30 minutes or until bubbly. Yield: 4 to 6 servings.
ROBYN DICKEY
